topic.title: Functional Status Problem Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: A functional status problem observation is a clinical statement that represents a patient's functional perfomance and ability.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14312, CONF:14313 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.68"
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14283)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:14307)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14284)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14314)/@code="248536006" finding of functional performance and activity (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14315)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:14304)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14286)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14287)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:14291)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:14316)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14294, CONF:14584, CONF:14317)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Medicinal Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14298, CONF:14586, CONF:14318)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Caregiver Characteristics (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:14463, CONF:14587, CONF:14464)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15552)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15553)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15554)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14288)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:14289)

If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved (CONF:14290)
value MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:14292)

If the diagnosis is unknown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be UNK. If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be OTH and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element (CONF:14293)
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
